description: Recreate takeaway pizza at home with this easy vegie-packed pizza recipe. It's nutritionally approved and ready in 30 minutes, making it perfect for a big night in!
name: Healthier Fakeaway Veggie Pizza Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Woolworths thin crust high protein pizza base

recipeInstructions.text: Place pizza base on tray. Spread over passata, then top with ricotta, zucchini, tomato and pine nuts. Bake for 20 minutes or until base is golden. Top pizza with a little rocket. Cut pizza into wedges and serve with remaining rocket.

Place pizza base on tray. Spread over passata, then top with ricotta, zucchini, tomato and pine nuts. Bake for 20 minutes or until base is golden. Top pizza with a little rocket. Cut pizza into wedges and serve with remaining rocket.
